title: Aidag DAO
tokenomicsText: A total of 17,999,000 Aidag tokens are held in the SoulwareAI + DAO wallet. These tokens are autonomously used for presale, bonus, liquidity, and staking.
rule40: 40% of presale revenue goes to the liquidity pool.
rule60: 60% of presale revenue goes to the founder wallet.
transparencyText: All rules are verified in smart contracts and visible on the block explorer. DAO members can confirm autonomous operation by checking contract addresses.
